pullrequest.title: Port Dynamic Lines and Renderable to ogre

content.raw: Oh got it. So I guess at this point we're mainly just checking it compiles and looks reasonable? I'm fine with getting this into `ign-rendering2`, but maybe we should only merge it once we have a way of trying it out? Or maybe there won't be a way to use this on `ign-rendering2`?
content.html: Oh got it. So I guess at this point we're mainly just checking it compiles and looks reasonable? I'm fine with getting this into ign-rendering2, but maybe we should only merge it once we have a way of trying it out? Or maybe there won't be a way to use this on ign-rendering2?
